title: AMA  rswizzled/PermanentBan

replies.body: Still remember me? I remember you <3 How've things been mateyy?
replies.body_tagged: Still remember me? I remember you <3 How've things been mateyy?

replies.body:
I have a couple of questions for you:
- When did you exactly leave?
- What do you miss about Avicus?
- What do you think about the new features Avicus has now?
- Who's your best friend here?
- Would you comeback someday? Be honest.

replies.body: Wow I'm swizzeled that rswizzeled is back?
replies.body_tagged: Wow I'm swizzeled that rswizzeled is back?

replies.body: Nonono you got it all wrong it was because of the Fryingpan
replies.body_tagged: Nonono you got it all wrong it was because of the Fryingpan

replies.body: You thinking of coming back as a mod?
replies.body_tagged: You thinking of coming back as a mod?

replies.body:
When did i leave?
 I didn't, i always lurked around just never logged in. School has taken a toll on me and life has been hard.
What do i miss?
 The people, everyone is nice and its just fun :)
New features?
 I honestly haven't noticed anything with the site, and i was only in game for a couple mins today.
Best friend? 
Hmmm, i dont really know honestly, im friends with everyone just not "super" close with anyone in particular.
Would i come back?
Im hoping so, school is tough right now and well its more important than minecraft at the moment but hopefully. :)
